nodes.text: Informahub was a communications line that was used on the planet Milvayne. When an incident was reported to Informahub, Milvayne's police force, the Milvayne Authority, would respond to the report. Sometime between 0 ABY and 3 ABY, when the assassin droid 0-0-0 threatened a train driver in Milvayne City, the driver reported him to Informahub, accusing him of being defective, and Milvayne Authority drones quickly arrived and threw him into the lower levels of the city. Soon after, the train driver received a sum of credits for reporting 0-0-0.
Informahub appeared in the comic Doctor Aphra 27, written by Si Spurrier and published by Marvel Comics on December 12, 2018.
